programme.title: Coming to America
Coming to America
programme.desc: An extremely pampered African prince travels to Queens, New York and goes undercover to find a wife that he can respect for her intelligence and strong will.

programme.title: White Christmas
White Christmas
programme.desc: A successful song-and-dance team become romantically involved with a sister act and team up to save the failing Vermont inn of their former commanding general.
